TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IImplicitResourceProvider

Docs.summary: Defines methods a class implements to act as an implicit resource provider.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Resources can be declared explicitly or implicitly within a page. Implicit resources allow the developer to assign a collection of resource values to a control in one statement rather than assigning each value individually. When the page parser encounters an implicit resource in the form of `meta:resourcekey="WelcomeLabel"`, it assigns all the values with the `WelcomeLabel` resource key prefix to the corresponding values in the control. For example, if a resource file defines values for `WelcomeLabel.Text` and `WelcomeLabel.ToolTip`, those values would be assigned to a `Label` control with an implicit reference to `WelcomeLabel`.
The <xref:System.Web.Compilation.IImplicitResourceProvider> interface defines the methods a resource provider implements to access implicit resources. You can obtain a particular value using the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.IImplicitResourceProvider.GetObject%2A> method.
If you create a custom resource provider, you do not need to provide customized support for implicit resource localization. Implicit localization will work with your resource provider.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.ICollection GetImplicitResourceKeys(string keyPrefix) cil managed

Docs.param: The prefix of the implicit resource keys to be collected.
Docs.summary: Gets a collection of implicit resource keys as specified by the prefix.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When implemented, the method returns a collection of implicit resource keys for a particular prefix. For example, `WelcomeLabel` is specified as the prefix in the expression `meta:resourcekey="WelcomeLabel"`. Any properties in a local resource file with `WelcomeLabel` as a prefix should be returned with this method.

MemberSignature.Value: public object GetObject (System.Web.Compilation.ImplicitResourceKey key, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetObject(class System.Web.Compilation.ImplicitResourceKey key, class System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture) cil managed

Docs.param: The resource key containing the prefix, filter, and property.
The that represents the culture for which the resource is localized.
Docs.summary: Gets an object representing the value of the specified resource key.
Docs.returns: An representing the localized value of an implicit resource key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When implemented, the method returns the object for the value represented by the implicit resource key.
